  • Events

Events¶

This module contains all event definitions

FlowStart(Environment, Delay, Flow) Flow begins generating packets
LinkAvailable(Environment, Delay, Router, Link) Router finishes sending a packet on Link
PacketReceipt(Environment, Delay, Router, ...) Router receives Packet on Link
UpdateRoutingTable(Environment, Delay, Router) Router updates its routing table

Flow Start¶

class cs143sim.events.FlowStart(Environment, Delay, Flow)[source]¶

Flow begins generating packets

Parameters:
  • Environment (simpy.core.Environment) – SimPy simulation environment
  • Delay (float) – time until flow starts
  • Flow (actors.Flow) – flow that starts

Link Available¶

class cs143sim.events.LinkAvailable(Environment, Delay, Router, Link)[source]¶

Router finishes sending a packet on Link

Parameters:
  • Environment (simpy.core.Environment) – SimPy simulation environment
  • Delay (float) – time until Router finishes
  • Router (actors.Router) – Router that finishes
  • Link (actors.Link) – Link on which a packet was sent

Packet Receipt¶

class cs143sim.events.PacketReceipt(Environment, Delay, Router, Link, Packet)[source]¶

Router receives Packet on Link

Parameters:
  • Environment (simpy.core.Environment) – SimPy simulation environment
  • Delay (float) – time until Packet begins to arrive at Router
  • Router (actors.Router) – Router that receives
  • Link (actors.Link) – Link on which Packet arrives
  • Packet (actors.Packet) – Packet that arrives

Update Routing Table¶

class cs143sim.events.UpdateRoutingTable(Environment, Delay, Router)[source]¶

Router updates its routing table

Parameters:
  • Environment (simpy.core.Environment) – SimPy simulation environment
  • Delay (float) – time until Router updates
  • Router (actors.Router) – Router that updates
